long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily share your posts and content across multiple Discord servers:

Streamline your communication by posting to various Discord servers simultaneously, saving you time and effort. 

Save the webhooks for all your servers, then customize your messages with rich text (bold, italics and images) and target specific server, ensuring your content reaches the right audience simultaneously.
